request.description: This creates a new Policy Group accepting all default policy values
Creates a new Pod Profile than sets the policy group value
Calls DNS2 variable to set a secondary server
This function will parse the VMM Pool environment variable to apply against a VLAN pool creation

ACI Login to fabric using environment variables
URL , USERNAME, PASSWORD
